effect.sun_moon: When this Pokémon uses a move that is sound-based, that move's type is Water.

effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: When this Pokémon uses a move that is sound-based, that move's type is Water.

flavor_text.sun_moon: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
